name: 20::Search For A Product Using A Keyword

actions.action: Enter a product name 'Hummingbird printed t-shirt' into the "Search" input box at the top of the page.
actions.expectedResult: The product name is successfully entered in the search box.

actions.action: Press the "Enter" key or click the search icon to submit.
actions.expectedResult: The search results page is loaded

actions.action: Verify that the product card containing 'Hummingbird printed t-shirt is visible on the page.
actions.expectedResult: At least one product card containing 'Hummingbird printed t-shirt appears in the search results.
